report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
chapter_title: Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: During our routine threat hunting exercise, Cyble Research Labs came across several Android malware samples with similar code targeting Android users via RAT activities.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
chapter_title: Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: These samples mostly use the names and icons of legitimate applications or organizations such as Invoice.apk, Google.apk, prueba.apk, ZiniTevi.apk, and cisamu.apk to lure the users into executing them.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
chapter_title: Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Based on our intelligence, we identified that this variant had surfaced frequently in the wild in the last few months. This new campaign has been active since March 2022, and we observed over 200 samples from the same variant targeting Android users.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
chapter_title: Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: We identified several sophisticated features in this malicious app. By leveraging these features, the app can steal data such as clipboard data, device info, SIM details, device IP, SMSs, device location, call logs, device MAC Address, etc. The application can also record video and audio, read SMS and take pictures from the camera as well.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: The malware requests users for 18 different permissions, of which it abuses 9. These dangerous permissions are listed below.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Our static analysis indicated that the malware steals the information from the infected device based on the commands received from the Command and Control (C&C) server.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: While launching the application for the first time, it hides its icon from the device screen and runs silently in the background. The below code snippet is used to hide the app icon.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 3 Code to Hide App Icon

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: After execution, the malware monitors the users clipboard activity, steals any data copied over to the clipboard, and sends it to the C&C server. The malware uses the code shown in Figure 4 to grab the clipboard data.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 4 Code to Grab Clipboard Data

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: The malware identifies the number of cameras present in the device and enumerates this data point to gain information about them. The malware can then use these identified cameras to capture images from the victims device.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 5 Code to Get Camera Info

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: The malware executes the deviceInfo() method to collect information about the victims device, such as manufacturer, model and brand details, etc. as shown in the figure below.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 6 Code to Get Device Info

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: The malware calls the getPhoneNumber() method to collect information about SIM details, IMEI number, mobile number, call state, etc.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 7 Code for Collect SIM Info

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Using built-in code, the malware can also identify the IP address of the infected machine, as shown in Figure 8.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 8 Code to Get IP Address

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: By collecting the victims SMS data, the Threat Actors can perform various malicious activities such as stealing contact details, bypassing Two-Factor-Authentication, etc.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 9 Code to Get SMSs

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Upon receiving a command from the C&C server, the malware steals the devices location through GPS and any connected networks.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Figure 10 Steals Device Location

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Based on the commands received from the TAs C&C server, the malware can also record audio using the devices microphone ,as shown in the below code snippet.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: We have listed the commands used by the TAs to control the infected device below:

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: The volume and sophistication of Cyberattacks on Android users are increasing daily. This malware category is one such example of an Android application pretending to be legitimate and performing RAT activities behind the scenes.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: According to our research, these types of malware are only distributed via sources other than Google Play Store. As a result, practicing basic cyber-hygiene across mobile devices and online banking applications is a good way to prevent malware such as this from compromising your devices.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: We have listed some essential cybersecurity best practices that create the first line of control against attackers. We recommend that our readers follow the best practices given below:

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: How to prevent malware infection?

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Download and install software only from official app stores like Google Play Store or the iOS App Store. Use a reputed anti-virus and internet security software package on your connected devices, such as PCs, laptops, and mobile devices. Use strong passwords and enforce multi-factor authentication wherever possible. Enable biometric security features such as fingerprint or facial recognition for unlocking the mobile device where possible. Be wary of opening any links received via SMS or emails delivered to your phone. Ensure that Google Play Protect is enabled on Android devices. Be careful while enabling any permissions. Keep your devices, operating systems, and applications updated.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: How to identify whether you are infected?

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Regularly check the Mobile/Wi-Fi data usage of applications installed on mobile devices. Keep an eye on the alerts provided by Anti-viruses and Android OS and take necessary actions accordingly.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: What to do when you are infected?

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Disable Wi-Fi/Mobile data and remove SIM card as in some cases, the malware can re-enable the Mobile Data. Perform a factory reset. Remove the application in case a factory reset is not possible. Take a backup of personal media Files (excluding mobile applications) and perform a device reset.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: What to do in case of any fraudulent transaction?

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: In case of a fraudulent transaction, immediately report it to the concerned bank.

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: What should banks do to protect their customers?

report_title: New malware Campaign delivers Android RAT. Sophisticated RAT spying on Mobile Devices
text: Banks and other financial entities should educate customers on safeguarding themselves from malware attacks via telephone, SMS, or emails.
